# Split Column

```{r}

pages <- file_1[2:21]

# Clean TOC

parse_page <- function(page){
  cols <- page %>%
    str_split("\n") %>%
    .[[1]] %>%
    tail(-4) %>%
    split_column() %>%
    str_split("\n")
  
  col_1 <- cols %>%
    map_chr(1)
  
  col_2 <-  cols %>%
    map(2) %>%
    compact %>%
    as.character
  
  c(col_1, col_2)
}

parsed_pages <- pages %>%
  map(parse_page) %>%
  compact %>%
  reduce(c)

parsed_pages %>%
  paste(collapse = "\n") %>%
  str_extract_all("\n[^\n]+[(r√§sident)|(Abg.)][^\n]+\\:")

```
